title: How a Sagittarius Woman Acts When She's in Love: 11 Signs She Loves You

steps.title: Sagittarian
steps.content: Sagittarian women often show love through actions in addition to words. These fiery women are freedom-loving signs, so they usually like their personal space. [1] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. But when a Sagittarius woman is in love with you, she’ll want to hold your hand as you walk down the street and cuddle up next to you after a long day. Sagittarians might not understand if their partner doesn’t share their cuddly nature. Nevertheless, don’t hesitate to let her know if you’re not into PDA. These signs like honest partners.

steps.title: Sagittariuses are intellectual, so they love to study their partners.
steps.content: Sagittariuses are intellectual, so they love to study their partners. These Jupiter-ruled signs are all about exploration–both geographically and intellectually. [2] X Research source They’re born for seeking truth and new knowledge throughout the world. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. A Sagittarian woman in love will ask you about your childhood dreams, your greatest fears, and all your life aspirations. Rather than responding with questions of your own, let your Sagittarius woman choose when to reveal information about herself. She’ll appreciate that you respect her privacy and freedom.

steps.title: Sagittarians usually prefer to keep things light, but that changes when they’re in love.
steps.content: Sagittarians usually prefer to keep things light, but that changes when they’re in love. Dating a Sagittarius woman can start out as a super casual, fun fling. After all, Jupiter’s influence makes these signs adventurous and tough to pin down. [4] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. But over time, she’ll start to tell you more and more about who she really is. She’ll let you in on her hopes and plans for the future, as well as the things that keep her up at night. Respond to your Sagittarius’ vulnerability with positivity and empathy. These fire signs appreciate a glass-half-full approach to life.

steps.title: The Archer of the zodiac is an honest, straight-shooting sign.
steps.content: The Archer of the zodiac is an honest, straight-shooting sign. Forget ghosting and being left on-read. Sagittarius women let you know exactly where they stand in the relationship. Your fiery gal won’t hesitate to let you know what she loves about you (...and even what she doesn’t like as much about you). If you have any qualms or concerns about the relationship, or if you’d like her to tone down the bluntness, let her know! She’ll appreciate the feedback.

steps.title: Sagittarius is the most optimistic sign.
steps.content: Sagittarius is the most optimistic sign. Dating a Sagittarius is like dating a motivational speaker. After all, Sagittarius’ ruling planet, Jupiter, is the planet of luck and fortune. Expect your Sagittarius partner to show up at your most important events with a “you’ve got this!” note and a 1000-watt smile. [5] X Research source Show your Sagittarius you’re as loyal as she is by shooting her an encouraging text from time to time. Try to keep your message short, because Sagittariuses aren’t into overly romantic gestures. Reader Poll: We asked 407 wikiHow readers and 54% agreed that they feel special and appreciated when a Sagittarius woman shows she cares about their comfort and happiness. [Take Poll] Lucky you!

steps.title: Sagittarius women are vivacious fire signs who love to laugh.
steps.content: Sagittarius women are vivacious fire signs who love to laugh. Expect a Sagittarius woman to express her love through playful teasing, spontaneous comedic roasts, and completely random texts throughout the day. You’ll never quite know what to expect from this witty sign. Sagittarians love it when their partner shares their sense of humor. Send your Sagittarius woman a GIF you think she’d like or plan a night to watch her favorite comedian’s new show.

steps.title: Sagittarius is the sign most associated with travel.
steps.content: Sagittarius is the sign most associated with travel. When a Sagittarius has feelings for you, she’ll want to share that love of exploration with you. She might suggest a weekend getaway to Italy or a bungee-jumping expedition off an old railroad trestle. She’ll always value her freedom, but her love for you just might turn her solo getaways into couple’s retreats. Sagittarians prefer adventure-themed gifts to romantic cards. Get your Sagittarius a gift like a plane ticket, a backpacking tent, or ski poles. [6] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021.

steps.title: Sagittarius women are social butterflies, and she’ll want to get involved in your network.
steps.content: Sagittarius women are social butterflies, and she’ll want to get involved in your network. Her desire to get to know your friends shows that she wants to be a part of your life. Bring her to your next party or schedule a group outing. In getting to know the important people in your life, she’ll feel more connected to you. Sagittarians are mutable signs. That means she’ll have no problem going with the flow in pretty much any social situation.

steps.title: A Sagittarius woman can be fiery, but she’ll never lose sight of what’s right.
steps.content: A Sagittarius woman can be fiery, but she’ll never lose sight of what’s right. Yes, a Sagittarius in love can be a little hot-headed from time to time, especially if she feels like she’s losing her independence. However, when these Archers are really in love, they’ll forgive and forget easily. A Sagittarius in love will make an effort to consider her partner’s needs and find compromises. If you get in a heated argument with a Sagittarius woman, take a few minutes to cool down. You’ll be able to have a more productive conversation after a short timeout.

steps.title: Sagittarians are individualistic, so they take a while to feel comfortable in relationships.
steps.content: Sagittarians are individualistic, so they take a while to feel comfortable in relationships. She might be wary of defining the relationship or taking big steps like moving in together. Keep in mind a Sagittarius woman wanting to take things slow probably doesn’t say anything about you. Jupiter’s powerful rule makes her a trailblazer and lone wolf. Try not to rush your Sagittarius woman, but feel free to start a conversation with a question like, “What are your relationship goals?” or “What does your ideal relationship look like?”

steps.title: Even in love, a Sagittarius will need space.
steps.content: Even in love, a Sagittarius will need space. These women are devoted partners, but they’re certainly not clingy people. A Sagittarius in love might want a weekend or two to herself from time to time. She’ll keep up her own hobbies and devote time to her own social circles. And yes, she might just leave on a weeklong trip to Joshua Tree or Tahiti if she wakes up one day feeling restless. Remember, her independence doesn’t mean she loves you any less. Sagittarians appreciate honesty, so don’t be afraid to have a talk about your expectations for spending time together.
